properties.description: To support the Market Share dashboard, a mapping of location to region is needed. This information is manually provided via a CSV file.

content.query:
-- Requirements: https://dev.azure.com/seaspan-edw/SMG-DataOps/_workitems/edit/2923
-- Notes:
--  There were two rows in the source data that contained the word "B". The quotes caused
--  problems upon query and so were removed. 

use silver;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [ppa].[vw_DIM_Regions]
AS SELECT 
    *
FROM  
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlssmgdev.dfs.core.windows.net/processed/silver/PPA/Regions',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
WITH (
    [PPA_Location_Name] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    [PPA_Region] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8
)
    AS [r]
